name: Casualties
description:
Submission to the GE Jam #3.

Theme: Duality

A Third Person Shooter, made in 3d. Kill as many Blurbles as you can before you die gloriously, and Liberate Greyville! Hoorah!

...Then look upon the horror of your work from the opposite side as a field doctor desperately trying to save the lives of the men and women you were slaughtering a moment earlier. With limited resources and limited time, who lives and who dies?

Every war has two sides, and the winners write the history books.


CONTROLS:

wasd - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Shoot / Interact
